title: 07/05/2021 - HOUR 1 - Giannis, Luka, Rodgers
itunes:title: 07/05/2021 - HOUR 1 - Giannis, Luka, Rodgers
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin separates Milwaukee Buck star Giannis Antetokounmpo's long-term value from Giannis in the short term or in a single series. The proof is reflected in the Bucks' Eastern Conference Finals success without Giannis. Also, Colin is floored by Dallas Maverick star Luka Dončić's ability to get his sparsely populated home country of Slovenia to the Olympics. Plus, FS1 NBA analyst Ric Bucher discusses the Milwaukee Bucks without Giannis. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
